issue.title: Google Play: com.appsteka.traceroute
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads)
 [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsteka.traceroute&pcampaignid=web_share](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.appsteka.traceroute%26pcampaignid%3Dweb_share)
### Comment
> Adguard DNS is not blocking Ads on the described App i.e. Traceroute App. So, the domain from which the ads are coming on this app should be blocked.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://pluto.tv/ca/live-tv/638e10de75c3a30007092693](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpluto.tv%2Fca%2Flive-tv%2F638e10de75c3a30007092693) ### Comment > When any type of ad filtering/blocking is enabled (adblocking or dns blocking), Pluto.TV is broken and will not play continuously. > > Steps: > > Enable normal Adblocking and/or DNS filtering > Go to Pluto.TV > Wait a few minutes (timing is different) and when an Ad is supposed to play, it errors out. comment.body:
Hi Alex-302.
sorry for the late reply.
the video stops working when that "broken image" comes up.  i feel like it's trying to load an ad but it can't and so just stops working altogether.  i have to refresh to get it to work - for a few minutes before it happens, or turn off DNS filtering off to get it to work without issues.

here's the screenshot you're asking for -- hopefully the correct one.

![plutotv_dns-on,adguard-on,inspection](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/94552683/36bbd1a5-77b3-4dc6-9f29-d9023f454323)

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: ogladajanime.pl
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://ogladajanime.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fogladajanime.pl) ### Comment > Przy odpalaniu odcinka otwiera nową kartę z reklamą. Dla każdego odcinka na start są dwie takie reklamy. Później przy obejrzeniu pierwszych minut aż do openingu gdzie pojawia się przycisk „Pomiń opening” po którego wciśnięciu znów pojawia się taka reklama. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hgywk153cbccossokscgkswcowwk4gc5wm0rjoo5ws.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard,
Polish Anti Adblock Filters

comment.body:
Dodałem reguły, który powinny to naprawić (aktualizacja filtrów będzie pewnie dostępna za około 1-2 godziny), ale ze względu na to, że darmowa wersja nie obsługuje zaawansowanych reguł, to te wyskakujące okienka nadal mogą się pojawiać.
W przypadku płatnej wersji może to działać, ale niektóre reguły są "uruchamiane" zbyt późno, więc z tego powodu też może być tak, że nie zawsze będzie działało. Ogólnie rozszerzenia do blokowania reklam w Safari są problematyczne i nie działają tak dobrze jak w innych przeglądarkach ¯\\\_(ツ)_/¯
